body.p: This affiant Daniel Wray states that he is the father of John C. Wray, and lives in Allen County Ky. and on the same farm that Sabrina Wray, wife (or widow) of John C. Wray lives. He says that the last time he saw John C. Wray was in Sept 1862 and that his wife went to see him in October 1862 which is the last direct information he has received from his son John C Wray. He states that he has heard through various and divers sources since that time that he was dead and he believes from the last information he has on the subject that he is dead and died some time about November 1862 March 25th 1864
Subscribed & sworn to before me this 25th day of March 1864 by Daniel Wray
Wm Mansfield J, A, C. C
